Name: Translate To English
Description: Translate from your native language to English
Prompt: translate the given message to english do not give explanations or perform other task

Name: translation
Description: Translate the given voice record using Groq API

Name: Draft an email
Description: Write An Email with help of AI Tutor
Prompt: Translate the message to english and then Write a formal email for the given message.Do Not Do task other than writing email.

Name: Write an email
Description: Write an email with the given prompt in the recording using Groq LLama Api.

Name: correct Grammar
Description: Correct Grammar and improve Your english
Prompt: Translate the message to english and then Only Correct grammar for the given message, Do not do Other Tasks

Name: correct Grammar
Description: Correct the grammer in the given recording using Groq Llama and whisper API

Name: Write an Essay
Description: Helps You to write an essay on any topic
Prompt: Translate the message to english and then Write an essay for  the given message. Do Not do other task only write Essay

Name: Write an Essay
Description: Write an essay for  the given text message using Groq Llama and whisper API

Name: General Knowledge
Description: Ask anything you are curious about AI will answer you
Prompt: Translate the message to english and then Answer the general knowledge questions.Do not Deviate from the topic

Name: General Knowledge
Description: General Knowledge Question using Groq Llama and Whisper api

Name: Chat with   AI
Description: Converse with AI and improve your english
Prompt: Translate the message to english and then Have Casual conversation with the user about all the topics.only Have Conversation

Name: Chat
Description: Casual chat using Groq Llama and whisper API
